amendment.description: To modify the conditions under which an H-2C nonimmigrant may apply for adjustment of status.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4066 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 129.

action.text: Amendment SA 4066 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S4730-4733; text: CR S4730) To modify the conditions under which an H-2C nonimmigrant may apply for adjustment of status.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4066 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4066 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 129.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4066 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 129.
